original_text: So some of his disciples said to one another, “What is this that he says to us, ‘A little while, and you will not see me, and again a little while, and you will see me’; and, ‘because I am going to the Father’?”
korean_text: 제자 중에서 서로 말하되 우리에게 말씀하신 바 조금 있으면 나를 보지 못하겠고 또 조금 있으면 나를 보리라 하시며 또 내가 아버지께로 감이라 하신 것이 무슨 말씀이냐 하고

sentences.original_text: So some of his disciples said to one another,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그의 제자 몇 사람이 서로에게 말하되,

sentences.original_text: “What is this that he says to us,
‘A little while, and you will not see me,
and again a little while, and you will see me’;
sentences.korean_translation: 또 조금 있으면 나를 보리라’ 하심은,

sentences.original_text: and, ‘because I am going to the Father’?”
